event.title: FSFE Zurich local group meeting in Zurich, Switzerland

body.p: The FSFE Zurich group has created the 'Lernen wie die Profis' campaign, which encourages schools to use Free Software. The group meets on the second Thursday of each month.

One of the group's plans now is to send letters and flyers about Free Software in Education. Join the next meeting to help! It is in German and takes place at Bitw√§scherei, Neue Hard 12, 3rd floor between 18.00 - 21:00.
